Urgent : Reading this 
breaking report may turn your body into an ultimate fat burning machine.

"I Dare You to Use These Proven Weightloss Secrets and NOT Dramatically Improve Your Metabolism, Your Weight loss,Your 
Health, and Your Body's capacity to burn fat automatically -- 100% GUARANTEED!" Or I Will Pay You $500 Out of MY Pocket . Hard to believe? You bet! But the fact 
is , the results from people just like you proves without a doubt that these 
secret Ayurvedic principles work like magic for anyone...

If you want to wake up tomorrow and know exactly how to and then start getting astonishing, 
immediate results from small (even teeny) amounts of lifestyle and diet changes... or massive weight loss results from committed,disciplined diet and yoga  regimen-- then shut down your email, lock the door, unplug the phone and 
devour this letter. You are in for the richest "ride of your life" as these Proven Weight Loss 
Secrets begin to transform your body overnight into the Fat Burning Furnace to make it look like the sexy  body you 
truly deserve to have. What you are about to discover is the most powerfull technique you could ever have . No matter what 
is your current diet and routine, once you have these techniques you will always be able to wield its amazing power to your benefit. It will permanently transform your body into a made to order,finely sculpted,perfect hollywood shape that you always dream about Finally, you will firmly be in control 
                  of your Health and the way you look . Yes, this short, provocative report will change your life 
forever. Ipromise, it's that powerfull. From the desk of: Rajesh Shetty. Dear Friend, Let me ask you 3 intriguing questions, 1)How can a simple breathing technique 
                  remove 90% of the toxins and help remove fat from your body permanently and make you look and feel 10 years younger without you ever having to cut even a single calorie from your daily diet? ? 2)How can you melt away all the fat stubbornly deposited in every nook and corner of your body with the help of natural herbs recommended by Ayurveda medical science like a ball of wax kept on a hot stove? 3)How can you take advantage of these 
                  Ayurvedic secrets Now ,to make your Thyroid and Lever keep burning fat automatically for you this very moment without you wasting your time,money and health starving on the restrictive diets like the thousands of innocent,ignorant people ? That almost sounds too far fetched to be true right? But what if the answers as you will find below are absolutely, YES.. .....YES        and ............... YES! Let's just for a moment asssume they are. What would that mean to you? Listen, just imagine if you woke up tomorrow morning and magically 
made it  happen. All of a sudden you now know exactly how to burn those fat cells, fire up 
                  your own metabolic organs so that you keep away toxins and fat 
                  from your body permanently, forever . Would that mean doubling the amount of weight you are currently losing every month.What would doubling your monthly weight loss mean to you? With the same effort you went from 5pounds a month to 10pounds a month,how much more weight can you lose this year? Unless you are philosophically opposed to being dramatically more successful 
in losing weight, then you would be hysterically ecstatic to wake up and know 
exactly how to do it with my proven weight loss secrets based on Ayurveda. So you WANT this to happen to 
you today. And because of the dramatic weight loss results that you get, you would be saving much 
more money that is getting wasted with your current diet plan and supplements.So if you are saving more money then the cost is 
not a question. So the real question is... Time! Can you learn how to make these small lifestyle changes in just one lazy 
afternoon (or night) and see immediate results? That is what you want, correct. To sit down for a few hours tomorrow and have these Proven weight loss secrets "magically" transferred from my brain to yours. Then be able to make small changes in diet and lifestyle and immediately see (vast) improvements 
in your body, your mind, your health, your shape, your 
looks,your self esteem -- in everything If Ishowed you other people, just like 
you, who are enjoying exactly what you want...Would you at least believe it is possible for you? It all began four years back. Iwas on a routine visit to my dear friend Dr.Rasik Shah's house.That was the time when Iwas dejected with my health and the excess fat on my abdomen. Dr.Rasik Shah is an expert Ayurveda doctor who specialises in dissolving heart blocks with simple herbs.He routinely cures people with complex deseases 
like heart blockages,asthma,blood pressure etc.with his herbs. Looking at the amazing success of his Ayurveda Medicinal practice,Ienquired him about whether he can do something about my abdominal fat. He immedietly said yes,why not?And gave me some simple tips and gave some herbs for quick results. As Iused these tips and the herbs that he recommended,within 3 weeks the fat started melting away from my abdomen like snow exposed to hot sun and Istarted feeling more and more energetic,enthusiastic and lighter from inside. Looking at this seemingly impossible weight loss experience,Idecided to interview him and extract every bit of knowledge he had about losing weight the Ayurveda way. As a combined result of this extensive interview and lots of my own studies of Ayurvedic books later,the e-book "Proven weightloss secrets revealed" was born. This e-book contains every bit of knowledge that Dr.Shah has about losing fat the Ayurveda way. If you don't know what is Ayurveda.Let me explain... Ayurveda is a 5000 year old medical science. Ayu" means life,"veda" means science or knowledge. Ayurveda means science of life. According to Ayurveda every body is unique.It has divided different body types into 3 main categories and further sub-divisions. Ayurveda says that what is good for a certain persons body type may not suit your own body type.Hence the first requirement for any weight loss program to succeed is to know your own exact body type. Once this is done,the rest is easy job,Ayurveda has a store house of time tested solutions for every conceivable desease known to mankind,including Obesity. This is exactly what my e-book covers in a very simple language so that any body including you can benefit from this powerfull knowledge so far only available to a select few like Dr.Shah. Recently Igave this book to hundreds of weight loss aspirants as a test and..... What happened next even amazed me Dozens of letters like these poured in...........

Testimonial ".... Ialready lost 3 pounds!!.." Ihave just started following your recommendations and am using just two techniques and the fat is slowly melting away.Irecommended it to my friends who are ready to get a copy of your e-book for themselves. Neetta Testimonial "...naturally, 
				without side effects ....excellent work" "The information that was presented was very helpful 
			and wonderfully written. What better way to go about weight loss than naturally, 
			without side effects ......... excellent work, the herbs along with your 
			instructions on their use is very helpful. I’ve learned very
			much and thank you." Closna Veronica A.- veronicaclosna@phs.com Testimonial ".... this is perfect for me!" "Ihave read all your
			information and this is perfect for me! Ihave no metabolism and I'm sure my
			organs have years of toxins due to stress and the other toxins in the air and
			food. Your weight loss suggestions are working for me. Please let me know when
			fat cutter will be released. Thank you." Diane Gaunt - BMWFAM0001@aol.com Testimonial ".... great value for money" "The e-book was easy to understand and very 
			practical. Loved the way all aspects of health were examined. 
			Eg. relieving stess and anxiety with the pranayama breathing exercises.
			It is great value for money with all the information to act on and 
			its a natural weight loss program, without side-effects." karyn b - kbilotto@bigpond.net.au

Listen,You either lose weight or don't. Ninety-nine out of a hundred people who go on a diet still don’t
		lose weight . They blame it on their own self,their excess eating habits. Wrong. This page is about joining the one in a hundred who lose weight, really
		lose weight,forever. My best selling digital e-book " Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed " based 
            on the secrets of Ayurveda medicinal science will show 
            you how to lose weight and keep it off, better
		than ever. Lose WEIGHT no matter what. No matter who you are , in whatever condition you are, you must lose weight. Are you a modern woman eager for that sexy body like Britney spears ? Or, you are a man who wants to get rid off those love handles for an amazingly ripped midriff! Maybe, you have lost weight many times 
            before only to regain it later? And you just want to quickly lose those excess pounds to look and feel younger,healthier . But... You NEITHER have the time and inclination for hours of backbreaking exercises . NOR do you have the patience to endure an anorexic (starvation) diet
			plan . Still you want to lose 30.40.. 60 pounds ?? Don't despair, It just doesn't matter . No matter how much weight you want to lose, " Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed " 
            will show you ,a dramatically easier and faster way for you to make amazing weight loss progress like no other book or program ever
		has. Just imagine yourself after losing most of your unwanted body fat. how light would it feel ? Like a huge burden lifted off you! Now imagine what wonderful changes will it bring in your personal relations ...your career ... the sudden love and respect your friends and colleagues start pouring on you . Or, enjoying the simple pleasures of a morning walk without the usual
		panting and huffing, and you are just floating in the morning breeze... light...
		really...light as air! . Wouldn't it be amazing if you could eliminate completely,the
		disease risks of 
            diabetes, heart disease, and colon cancer FOREVER FROM YOUR 
            LIFE , which always
		seem to follow an obese person like a shadow? Only Proven Weight loss Secrets gives you 100% Weightloss results that stays gone forever! When you use the practical 100% proven-to-perform weight loss 
            tips from my digital 
		book based on Ayurveda, Firstly, you will Lose toxins and then start burning fat , and once the fat is burnt you will keep it off forever . If you have allready tried one or more of the diet programs and failed or are currently on one,
		doesn't matter, my e-book will show you exactly why
		you failed and correct the problem from the root . Fortunately,with 
            "Proven Weight Loss Secrets Revealed" the things are in your control now .... It's all under your control Losing weight the " Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed "
		way is far easier than by dieting and starving and juggling for hours
		in a gym . To succeed in losing weight this way, you only have to make good on three EASY
		STEPS , each one directly under your control... STEP1--Eliminate nasty toxins from your body. STEP2--Eliminate fat from your body - By increasing metabolism. STEP3--Keep off the fat forever. If you master the big 3 , you must succeed in losing 
		weight, why?....
		Because there are no other variables. Yes, if you master the Big 3, you will succeed, but the "catch" is that
		you must succeed at all three. "Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed" masters the Big 3 . All the weight loss experts out there preach one thing…. Change your
		diet…… Gulp some pills ( read chemicals ) and presto…….. the weight will
		disappear. Too simplistic…. Sadly, it doesn't work that way . To truly succeed you need a scientific,comprehensive and cohesive approach, that
		works . And it must be designed according to your own body’s 
		unique requirements . Ihave included it all in " Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed ". There is simply no other alternative . Think about it this way.... Mastery of any single STEP would be useless without the other two
		pieces of the puzzle. For example.... Without eliminating accumulated toxins from your body, you simply can't eliminate fat just by changing your diet . At best you will lose some water making you think that you have lost weight.Which is merely an 
              illusion! Or If you have not increased your own body’s metabolism by improving/
			correcting the functioning of various organs of your body responsible for
			metabolism, like your Thyroid gland, whatever
			weight you may lose by diet pills/diet plan comes right back on after a while. Moreover, prolonged use of these diet pills has a lot of side effects and
		Ineed not tell you what effect yo-yo dieting has on your body and psyche. In both the cases you are finished, and back to the square one . If you want to significantly LOSE WEIGHT AND KEEP IT OFF FOREVER ... You must fit all three pieces together perfectly! You must excel at all three
		steps. So " Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed " Ayurveda package includes it all, mastery of all three steps.
1.   Removing toxins from the body

Very little has been written about this all-important topic. Thoroughly
				tested and proven, this digital volume explains it all in simple and practical
				terms.
2.   Eliminating fat from your body

Experts (who have never lost an ounce of fat themselves) have written books
				on low calorie dieting, on high fat dieting and on countless other weight loss
				topics. But this is the one and only comprehensive book that says, from actual experience ...
"HERE... HERE IS exactly how to lose fat from every part of your body"
3.   Keep off fat forever

Surprisingly, there is not much thought gone into this aspect of losing
				weight. If whatever weight you have lost in a short span of say 30-90 days is
				going to come back within the next 6 months or a year… what is the point of
				losing it in the first place?

This book narrows it down to what works , and how to accomplish
		it in the real word, now . Equally importantly , it steers you away 
		from all the time and money wasting techniques that are so widely marketed. " It’s great, only three steps to master ", you say, " But exactly how do Isucceed at them ?" HOW TO ABSOLUTELY NAIL THE BIG 3 , FIRST, REMOVE TOXINS FROM YOUR BODY ... Faulty diet, polluted environment and stressful living introduce a lot of toxins into your system. 
		These toxins are deposited in and around the fat
		cells of your body making them very stubborn to dislodge . So,Ayurveda says, a good weight loss program must begin with detoxification .
		Because until and unless these toxins are removed from your body, there won’t
		be any significant weight loss which can be sustained over a long period of
		time. "Shifting to a healthier diet plan without getting rid of the toxins in the 
		body is just like putting a freshly prepared cake in a bin full of garbage! The 
		cake also becomes garbage in a short while". So, the e-book covers How to get rid of 90% of toxins through breath? (The main cause of
			excess fat) What are the 5 secret whole body purification techniques recommended by Ayurveda for burning fat and removing toxins completely? How to get rid of pounds of impacted wastes and toxins in the colons
			forever? How to get rid of Stress-the No.1 factor for abdominal fat? How to apply the ancient Yoga practice to circulate energy throughout your body to flush out toxins and look and feel younger,be energetic like a teenager? Which
			specific Yogasanas will give you instant relief from toxins and fat with a long term effect. Which brings us to the next step .... Once your body is free of toxins , it’s time to get rid of fat .... SECOND, BURN FAT Ok, you have eliminated toxins from your body. And lets assume that you have
		great patience and with lots of grit and determination-- you have stuck to a
		definite diet plan recommended by a leading diet company. What's the difference between success and failure ? ....Your own body's metabolism ! It's the make or break step.
Lose Weight while you SLEEP

Imust tell you that the most important factor for fat loss is your body's resting
		metabolic rate (RMR). Your RMR is the body's most basic calorie burning rate. RMR keeps burning calories constantly irrespective of whether
		you are sitting or sleeping. If you don't know it, RMR is responsible for burning 50-70% of
		calories you eat. Hence, increasing RMR is the single most important factor in your weight loss (fat
		loss) goal. Sadly, dieting reduces metabolism(RMR)! . "Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed" is jammed with 
		scientifically proven, fully tested strategies for
		firing up your metabolism and burn fat! No "shoulds" or "coulds" by diet experts who have never
		lost a pound themselves. "Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed" works ! It doesn't matter whether you are the most sedentary, bulimic female 
		out there or work in front of a computer for
		12 hours a day and surviving on a junk diet of pizzas and burgers, this book
		will simply boost your body’s metabolism like a wild jungle fire . It will simply convert your body fat into usable energy . "Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed" covers it 
		all ....everything and removes the guesswork and trial and error that you need to do with any other program. Here are just a few of the most important topics, researched 
		and included to cover the best scientifically proven techniques and tricks right now .... What is the secret of the Ayurveda herbs that boost metabolism dramatically to burn
			whatever amount of fat you may have? How to re-activate your own body's fat burning organs so as to acieve weight loss naturally? How to use drinking water effectively to flush out toxins and easily burn fat? How to Increase your metabolism by 20% just by eating these foods? Know the 11 postures that automatically burn fat. You will become an expert in the art of burning fat and losing pounds of fat
		from anywhere on your body. The bottom line? When you finish reading the e-book, you will know exactly how to lose weight ! Naturally, when you have eliminated all the toxins, and
		started burning fat by increasing metabolism, all that is left is
		keeping the burnt fat off. Easy, right? Nope! ..... 
		But definitely " doable.... " Third, keep off the fat forever... Once, you have got rid of the toxins responsible for stubborn fat cells,
		kick started your metabolism, it is time to continuously keep burning fat
		automatically and not let any new fat deposition to take place in your body . There are hundreds of books on weight loss-Ihave read most of them. Ialso
		subscribe to every newsletter, magazine on the subject. All these techniques for losing weight seem very interesting to read...but
		they don’t work. If you have tried these methods you will agree that most of
		what is written in there is extremely time in efficient. To be blunt.... Most of these strategies are ....huge time wasters. The basic approach of these experts itself is wrong. Ihave tried all these
		methods, and through pains taking trial and error Ihave tested the principles
		of Ayurveda on my own self and perfected my own techniques, which work . Using these techniques Ihave eliminated toxins, burnt fat and kept fat off from my own body for over four years! The result? My body fat is consistently under 6% ……. for the last four 
            years in a row.Moreover Inever visited a physician during this entire period.Call it perfect health! Ihave used my strategies to lose whatever amount of weight (fat) Iwanted.
		The result is there for everybody to see....it got to a point where Ibecame so
		skinny (by continuously trying these strategies) any more reduction, and Iwould simply vanish in thin air (just joking). Moral of the story? Simple....just followed my own advise from the book to lose
		weight. "Proven Weightloss Secrets Revealed" based 
            on Ayurveda is not theory... it really works . Secret of Secrets....... This book reveals it all. You will discover how to keep burning fat to keep
		it off forever in the most time efficient , money efficient ways
		possible... with the least efforts . It reveals to you the one big secret of keeping fat off forever. And the
		secret is...optimize the functioning of your own body’s organs responsible
		for burning fat. Idevote special attention to the single most important fat burning
		method of all.... How to optimize the functioning of all the organs responsible for burning
		fat and keeping it off irrespective of whether you are putting conscious
		efforts or not?.... These organs are…. Thyroid gland Stomach Liver Kidney Pancreas Colons Spleen Lymphatic system Thymus gland Adrenals To lose fat and keep it off forever you MUST optimize the
		functioning of all these organs. Any imbalance in the functioning of any of these organs will mean added
		fat . Yes, no matter how seriously you may be dieting, how motivated you are
		towards your goal of weight loss you cannot escape the rude fact that even if
		something is slightly wrong with these organs all your efforts will go down
		the drain ! This book shows you step-by-step, exactly how to optimize the functioning of
		your own body’s fat burning ability .... Simply, Naturally, Deadly effectively, Clinically, .... and in such a way that you need not lift a finger to lose weight and
		keep it off.... your own body does it for you automatically day after day after
		month after MONTH...! " This alone is worth many times the price of your package " Fine Tune Your own Body to Burn Fat On Auto-Pilot... Day In And Day Out! Here is a quick look at the real juicy Fat burning secrets based on the secrets of 
            Ayurveda that you are going to learn How to get your liver to function at 100% efficiency,so that it keeps emulsifying stored fat day in and day out? How to 
              work up your thyroid so that it spews enough hormones to crank up your metabolism and burn fat for you,automatically while you sleep? Why do 98% of all the dieters who go on a diet fail to lose weight
				and regain more than whatever was there before
				dieting and how to avoid it completely? How to easily build lean muscle mass and and jumps start your RMR? What are the two main causes of abdominal 
              fat accumulation? and How to get rid of abdominal fat with 
              this one simple technique? How to improve your digestion efficiency by almost 300%
				so that you can keep on eating your favourite food (fat
				included) and still lose weight. Which wonder grass reduces fat by supplying the body
				with all the essential enzymes and minerals? What are the Six ingredients in the American diet, which are the root
				cause of all fat accumulation-how to avoid them to lose weight? Which ONE simple technique increases your metabolism by 20% in the 
				morning and all day long ?- more metabolism means more fat burn . There is so much theoretical information out there. Most of it sounds
		good. But your time spent will not justify the negligible weight loss or the
		lack of long term results. My e-book completes the full package . From eliminating toxins ,
		to increasing
		metabolism to burn fat , to keeping fat off by optimizing the organs you are in total control of your health and destiny . What Exactly Will You Get ? So what does "Proven Weightloss Secrets 
		Revealed" cover exactly? In summary, here's what you get:

You will get 200+ pages full of cutting edge tips tricks and
			techniques to lose whatever amount of fat you wish to lose. 
			This includes all the secrets Ihave used personally to keep my body fat under 12% for the last three years

			chart for your unique type of body. What is included in the bonuses?- You get 6 free bonuses worth $395..... Secrets Of Diet Programs Revealed - A $50 value, this e-book reveals all the pros and cons of diet programs 
available in the market today. 50 Best Of The Best Indian Recipes - A $50 value. These mouth watering Indian dishes will ensure that your 
weight loss journey is not boring and dull. My Million Dollar Online Consultancy - 
A $200 Value. This free 6 months online consultancy for any health 
problem you or your family may have is a huge advantage for you. You just have 
to send across all the details of the health condition you are experiencing with 
relevant reports by e-mail. Our expert ayurvedic doctors will analyze your 
condition and give you free advise - for a period of 6 months . Diet Supplements Revealed - A $50 value, Evaluation of the diet supplements available in the market. Health Resources - A $25 value. 
Finest resources online for health, fitness and weight loss-Personally 
researched and used by me. Calorie Counter -A $20 Value.Gives detailed 
analysis of 1000 food items under the heads Food Calorie, Fats, Carbohydrates, 
Proteins, Saturated Fats, Cholesterol.
